Text: There are too few Viking themed games out there..Kudos on sharing one of the few!
currently i am only able to get the multiplayer, anything i should know to do the single?
This is the expansion of the game Rune, but is also the stand-alone multiplayer version. To be able to play the single player "campaign" thing, download the original.
One of the best multiplayer hack'n'slash games ever made. TONS of modding available aswell. I zerged this shit for 2 years straight
